full_text:
Re: Here is the final statement that can send to all media who contacted MCC NY on Epstein last night and this morning
From Lee Plourde
To (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Date 2019/07/25 12:01
Subject: Re: Here is the final statement that can send to all media who contacted MCC NY on Epstein last night and this morning
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Thank you (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Date: 7/25/19 11:40 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Cc: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>, Lee Plourde <(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Here is the final statement that can send to all media who contacted MCC NY on Epstein last night and this morning
>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) - 07/25/2019 11:40 >>>
Thank you
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) 7/25/2019 10:58 AM >>>
Wow, right as I finished my last email, my boss just gave me the final response that I'll now send to all the reporters who reached out to our public affairs office in Central Office (you can send this to media who contacted you too) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York and not in a local hospital as has been reported. As with all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement.
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Public Information Office
Federal Bureau of Prisons
(202) 353-(b)(6)
>>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) 7/25/2019 10:54 AM >>>
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Page 3810
DOJ-OGR-00023865

text_blocks.content: Re: Here is the final statement that can send to all media who contacted MCC NY on Epstein last night and this morning
Subject: Re: Here is the final statement that can send to all media who contacted MCC NY on Epstein last night and this morning
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
Subject: Re: Here is the final statement that can send to all media who contacted MCC NY on Epstein last night and this morning

Wow, right as I finished my last email, my boss just gave me the final response that I'll now send to all the reporters who reached out to our public affairs office in Central Office (you can send this to media who contacted you too) (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York and not in a local hospital as has been reported. As with all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement.

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The redactions are marked as (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C), indicating that the information is protected under the Freedom of Information Act.
